comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Well hang in there Steve. I hope you recover soon. Don't forget to put your teeth under your pillow tonight and probably there'll be four dollars there when you wake up. Or maybe it should be four beers. :-) -- Mark.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Steve, Quit drooling on the keyboard and go lay down for pete's sake. Hope you feel way better soon. Sorry you couldn't have used my dentist, but he doesn't get out for three more years. He was really good at that pain stuff. PS, You missed one of my better roadkill incidents today.
